On Fri, Aug 23, 2002 at 09:26:47AM +0100, Padraig Brady wrote:
[...]
> probably a bit old, 7.3 and 8.0 are out.
And I've been told by a SuSE rep that 8.1 will be out in October,
for those who are interested.
David
